title: Caloy
body:
<<Caloy>>
Oh thank goodness! A guardian of dreams! Please, whatever it takes, save the [b]Master of Dreams[/b]! 
Our realm is in grave danger in the hands of Mare, the [b]Mistress of Darkness[/b]...
<<Tala>>
I promise that with all my might, I will save this Realm of Dreams of ours..
Now I must go my way to save our Master
<<Caloy>>
Go! New guardian, enter the [b]Castle of Dreams[/b] and save our realm!
